Title: Requires a written determination to be made, on each application for issuance or renewal of a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver, within 180 days of receipt
Summary: Requires a written determination to be made, on each application for issuance or renewal of a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver, within 180 days of receipt; requires refund of all fees submitted with such application if a determination is not made in a timely manner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring application for a license to carry or possess a pistol or revolver to be acted upon within 180 days of the receipt thereof
